'''Mysterious Bolognese''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Flaming Red Bolognese]] with [[Lisa]]. The [[recipe]] for Flaming Red Bolognese is obtainable from [[Good Hunter]] for 2,500 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20.

Mysterious Bolognese restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
